asteroids

Class Laser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • asteroids.Laser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Laser
extends java.awt.Polygon
    Contains the data and instructions for movement for the lasers shot in the game.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Casey Scarborough
    See Also:
    GameBoard, SpaceShip, Serialized Form
